entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Shilo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:56 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending before morning then cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:56 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:56 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
